019package com.plotsquared.core.command;
020
021import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.caption.TranslatableCaption;
022import com.plotsquared.core.location.Location;
023import com.plotsquared.core.permissions.Permission;
024import com.plotsquared.core.player.PlotPlayer;
025import com.plotsquared.core.plot.Plot;
026import com.plotsquared.core.util.Permissions;
027import com.plotsquared.core.util.StringMan;
028import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
029import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.Tag;
030import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.resolver.TagResolver;
031
032public abstract class SetCommand extends SubCommand {
033
034    @Override
035    public boolean onCommand(PlotPlayer<?> player, String[] args) {
036        Location location = player.getLocation();
037        Plot plot = location.getPlotAbs();
038        if (plot == null) {
039            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot"));
040            return false;
041        }
042        if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
043            if (!Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_COMMAND.format(getFullId()))) {
044                player.sendMessage(
045                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
046                        TagResolver.resolver(
047                                "node",
048                                Tag.inserting(Component.text(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_COMMAND.format(getFullId())))
049                        )
050                );
051                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("working.plot_not_claimed"));
052                return false;
053            }
054        }
055        if (!plot.isOwner(player.getUUID())) {
056            if (!Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_COMMAND.format(getFullId()))) {
057                player.sendMessage(
058                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
059                        TagResolver.resolver(
060                                "node",
061                                Tag.inserting(Component.text(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_COMMAND.format(getFullId())))
062                        )
063                );
064                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_plot_perms"));
065                return false;
066            }
067        }
068        if (args.length == 0) {
069            return set(player, plot, "");
070        }
071        return set(player, plot, StringMan.join(args, " "));
072    }
073
074    public abstract boolean set(PlotPlayer<?> player, Plot plot, String value);
075
076}
